tweet_text:
@BowTiedCrow @BowTiedNaga A T120 is probably gonna be my next bike (if not a HD Softail or metric cruiser)

I need something that will crush highway miles in comfort, and I just can't get around the aesthetic of adventure bikes or sport-tourers. As much as I wish I was, I'm not Ewan McGregor.
